Are you sure you want to exit?
Theatre SMS will make your phone theatre-friendly! Respond to text messages knowing you are causing the least amount of disruption possible to your fellow movie-goers

Activating this switch will:

	- Dim your screen
	- Set your phone to silent-mode
	- Set the text to an easily read colour
	- Display the most recent text message you receive

You can then respond while respecting those around you
